item.description:
Member Sam Mirsky requested a dinner fly-out for the only Wednesday we have open in the next six weeks. Being an accommodating soul I thought a mystery flight for dinner would be fun. I'll plan a trip to a not-too-far airport that includes a local restaurant. And that most likely means we've been there before. Highlighting pens and rulers will be available for the few of us that still draw lines on sectionals ("all available information...") as a backup to GPS and VOR navigation.

We'll meet in the parking lot near the flag pole in front of the airport terminal building for a briefing at 5:30 P.M., then off we go by 6:00.

Thanks Sam, for the idea. See you on the 7th!

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Mystery Dinner Flight to ???????????
